content: Email and password copied to clipboard

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a tooltip when credentials are copied to the clipboard. It appears on a password input field, providing users with confirmation of what information has been copied.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'E-poçt ünvanı və şifrə mübadilə buferinə kopyalandı' is a literal translation but doesn't convey the meaning of 'copied to clipboard' naturally in Azerbaijani. 'Mübadilə buferinə' (to exchange buffer) is not the typical way to describe copying to the clipboard. A more natural phrasing would be something along the lines of 'keçmiş lövhəyə/yaddaş lövhəsinə kopyalandı' (copied to the pasteboard/memory board).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: E-poçt ünvanı və şifrə keçmiş lövhəyə kopyalandı.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence is grammatically correct, but could potentially be improved for readability based on context (e.g., adding a conjunction or restructuring).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: E-poçt ünvanı və şifrə, keçmiş lövhəyə kopyalandı.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The verb tense 'wurde' (was/were) is used with 'kopiert' (copied). It suggests a completed action in the past, which doesn't necessarily need to be emphasized in this context. 'kopiert' on its own would be more appropriate to indicate the action just occurred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: E-Mail und Passwort wird in die Zwischenablage kopiert

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Finnish translation uses the verb 'oon' which is a colloquial, shortened form of 'on'. In this formal context, the full form 'on' should be used.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sähköposti ja salasana on kopioitu leikepöydälle

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "Presse-papier" is a literal translation of "clipboard" and might sound overly formal or technical for a typical user interface. A more natural phrasing would be "copiés dans le presse-papiers".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Adresse mail et mot de passe copiés dans le presse-papiers

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Էլփոստը և գաղտնաբառը պատճենվել են սեղմատախտակ' literally translates to 'Email and password have been copied to clipboard'. A more natural and accurate translation would be something like 'Էլփոստը և գաղտնաբառը պատճենվեցին սեղմատախտակում' which means 'Email and password were copied into the clipboard'.
The translation 'メールとパスワードをクリップボードにコピー' is technically correct but slightly stiff and not idiomatic for a user notification. A more natural phrasing would be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: メールとパスワードをクリップボードにコピーしました

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'clipboard' is misspelled. It should be 'ເຄື່ອງວັດແທກ' (keuang wat taek) which is the more common Lao equivalent for 'clipboard'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ສຳເນົາອີເມວ ແລະ ລະຫັດຜ່ານໄປທີ່ ເຄື່ອງວັດແທກ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While the word-for-word translation is understandable, a more natural Lao phrasing would be better. The current translation sounds somewhat literal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ອີເມວ ແລະ ລະຫັດຜ່ານຖືກສຳເນົາໄປທີ່ເຄື່ອງວັດແທກ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English term 'password' is best translated to 'senha' in this context, as 'palavra-chave' can imply a more complex or unique identifier. 'Senha' more accurately represents the user's password.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Email e senha copiados para a área de transferência

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a space before 'clipboard'. In Romanian, 'în' is often used before 'clipboard' when indicating placement or containment. While not strictly incorrect, it's more natural to use 'în clipboard'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Adresa de e-mail și parola sunt copiate în clipboard

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Email in geslo sta kopirana v odložišče' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Email and password copied to clipboard'. 'Geslo' refers to a secret, but 'password' is more specific and common in this context. The verb conjugation is also slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Email in geslo sta kopirana v zgodovino izjemke.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'привремену меморију' (temporary memory) is not the standard way to refer to the clipboard. The commonly used term is 'клипоард' (clipboard).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Емаил и лозинка копирани у клипоард

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Email i lozinka kopirani u privremenu memoriju" is not the most natural way to say "Email and password copied to clipboard" in Serbian (Latin). "Privremena memorija" translates to 'temporary memory', which is not the common understanding of a clipboard.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Email i lozinka kopirani u isečnu tablu

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "Email i lozinka kopirani u isečnu tablu" could be improved for better readability. Consider capitalization and punctuation for UI elements.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Email i lozinka kopirani u isečnu tablu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Đã sao chép email và mật khẩu vào bộ nhớ tạm' is technically correct but not the most natural or idiomatic Vietnamese for this context. 'Bộ nhớ tạm' (temporary memory) is a literal translation of 'clipboard' and sounds less user-friendly. A better term would convey the action of copying to a convenient location.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Đã sao chép email và mật khẩu vào khu vực chờ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Đã sao chép' is accurate, a more conversational and commonly used phrase might be preferred. It is slightly formal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Email và mật khẩu đã được sao chép
